message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I believe it would be very valuable to you, so I'm offering it to you for $145.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $130 is a fair offer, I'm looking to get closer to $140 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $135?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $130. Would you be willing to go down to $132?
